item.title: Lawk Plawkz
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

judostar1:

So is this gonna be a crappy dspk, a 562 loading 600+ cache or is it a 6##?[/quote][quote=“WowILikeToCode, post:1, topic:418726”]a basic PI

[quote=“WowILikeToCode, post:1, topic:418726”]So thats when i thought, Well, Maybe PI isn’t the way to go, So i stripped it all down to basics.[/quote]hurrrrdurrr.

Read full topic

item.title: Lawk Plawkz
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:7, topic:418726”][quote author=demps2k9 link=topic=521270.msg3787736#msg3787736 date=1319031690]

  1. Do not release it.

The reason I am saying don’t release it, is because everyone is just going to download the source, and then host it. Very few people will make it better.
[/quote]

Even if they don’t make it better, the average person at least deserves to have a server that doesn’t get absolutely repetitive after 15 minutes of playing.[/quote]

exactly.

OT: So is this gonna be a crappy dspk, a 562 loading 600+ cache or is it a 6##?

Read full topic

item.title: Lawk Plawkz
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“demps2k9, post:6, topic:418726”]1) Do not release it.

The reason I am saying don’t release it, is because everyone is just going to download the source, and then host it. Very few people will make it better.[/quote]

Even if they don’t make it better, the average person at least deserves to have a server that doesn’t get absolutely repetitive after 15 minutes of playing.

Read full topic

item.title: Lawk Plawkz
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

  1. Do not release it.

The reason I am saying don’t release it, is because everyone is just going to download the source, and then host it. Very few people will make it better.

  1. Make it have a good economy similar to how RS used to be like. All items are made with skills or dropped by monsters besides the basic tinderbox etc, and maybe the odd couple of shops with bronze - mith or something like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Lawk Plawkz
item.dc:creator: @pot_up_pls pot up pls
item.description:
@pot_up_pls wrote:

JavaTC:

My only suggestion is add a better economy base than pking, godwars, and thieving All servers tend to focus arround those 3 things instead of a real economy.

This; Like a server that you can make money from, kinda hard, such as making your own super str ect, without buying them from the shop And killing drags for dragon bones, which would make people money, alot off people like servers like this. Goodluck with the development mate, if you need any help/gfx Pm me.

Read full topic

item.title: Lawk Plawkz
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

JavaTC:

This sounds nice. I think you should probably release it though. If no one else releases anything good then we’ll be stuck with the same generic DSPK servers we have now. I can understand you don’t want random noobs just taking it and profiting, but if you think about it, releasing it could help the entire private server community by giving them servers that are at least worth playing.

I understand where you’re coming from and i respect your opinion, I will consider this. Any suggestions on what to add let me know

Read full topic
